ygData.subject: Re: Freeport
ygData.msgSnippet: I know this may seem obvious but why not just jump on the boat tool over to felwithe for the shield and maybe stay awhile
ygData.messageBody:
I know this may seem obvious but why not just jump on the boat tool over to
felwithe for the shield and maybe stay awhile

> -----Original Message-----
> From: King, Darrin [SMTP:dking@...]
> Sent: Tuesday, May 11, 1999 9:59 AM
> To: 'eqpaladin@onelist.com'
> Subject: Re: [eqpaladin] Freeport
>
> From: "King, Darrin" <dking@...>
>
> *you can answer
> *mine. What red shield and where in Felwithe did you buy it? Thanks
>
> Aye, the shop directly in front of the bank entrance in Felwithe, which
> sells weapons, chain and plate armor, and shields. They have both
> "medium"
> and "small" shields of that red wooden variety. They have a wooden cross
> section and 4 red plates basically. It sounds odd but basically it is a
> more colorful skin so to speak for the targ shield look.
>
> Amoroth
> Karana server
>
